name: Dark Grid
description:
A survival turn-based-battle game about the journey to destroy the Dark Grid that spreads its darkness all over the world! Choose your plan, upgrade you stats and  kill the monsters that lies with in.

  • Graphics:
    • Admurin
    • Pipoya
    • Jerom
    • Emerald
    • joshshshsh
    • Sinestesia
    • Game-icons.net
  • Music: Juhani Junkala
